Part/NNP VIII./NNP PART/NNP I./NNP Fardorougha,/NNP the/DT Miser./NNP It/PRP was/VBD on/IN one/CD of/IN those/DT nights/NNS in/IN August,/NNP when/WRB the/DT moon/NN and/CC stars/NNS shine/VBP through/IN an/DT atmosphere/NN clear/JJ and/CC cloudless,/NN with/IN a/DT mildness/NN of/IN lustre/NN almost/RB continental,/VBD that/IN a/DT horseman,/NN advancing/VBG at/IN a/DT rapid/JJ pace,/NN the/DT horseman./NN "For/IN a/DT miricle-ay!"/NN replied/VBD the/DT female;/JJ "who's/NNS _down_,/, in/IN the/DT name/NN o'/IN goodness?"/JJ "Why,/NNS thin,/VBP I'm/NNP thinkin'/NN you'll/MD be/VB "Well,/IN betther/RB late/JJ than/IN never--the/DT Lord/NNP be/VB praised/VBN for/IN all/DT His/PRP$ gifts,/NN anyhow./RB Put/VBD your/PRP$ horse/NN down/RB to/TO the/DT mountin'-stone,/NN and/CC I'll/NNP be/VB wid/VBN you/PRP in/IN half/NN a/DT jiffy,/RB acushla."/JJ She/PRP immediately/RB drew/VBD in/IN her/PRP$ head,/NN and/CC ere/NNP the/DT messenger/NN had/VBD well/RB placed/VBN his/PRP$
